configuration.mailchimp_subject_line: Check out the balenaHub Container Registry, build an autonomous vehicle, meet Sunlamp, EtcherPro is FCC certified
configuration.mailchimp_preview_text: Monthly updates on projects, features, and events from balena April 2022

featured.text:
Dear Reader,

Any block published to balenaHub is now available to download directly as a container image, no additional registry pushes required. The balenaHub Container Registry also includes image release management and image references that you can use directly in your docker-compose files.

Also in this months email:

  • Build an autonomous vehicle (DonkeyCar!)
  • Build an automated LED Sunlamp
  • EtcherPro is now FCC certified
  • Become a balena Ambassador
  • Build an admin interface for Openbalena

news.title: Build a DonkeyCar Autonomous Vehicle
news.text: More people are looking to balena to manage fleets of autonomous vehicles and robots. Use this tutorial as your entry into this world, using the existing DonkeyCar stack and balena to build your first autonomous vehicle!

news.title: Meet Sunlamp, an elegant LED automation solution
news.text: Balenista Jon recently graduated from his labs residency where he built an ambient light which mimics the natural light cycle of the sun throughout the day.

news.title: EtcherPro is now FCC certified!
news.text: We've worked hard for months to find a solution to reduce EtcherPro emissions. By passing FCC Certification, we are now able to ship to U.S. destinations.

projects.title: Become a balena Ambassador
projects.text: Do you love using any of the balena products? Would you like to connect to other balena enthusiasts, learn more about the product and shape the future of balena? Apply to become an ambassador.

projects.title: Deploy CrateDB with balena
projects.text: CrateDB is a leading open-source, distributed SQL database, which you can now run on your IoT devices with balena using the Crate block. Check out the tutorial on the Crate forums.

projects.title: Build an admin interface for openbalena
projects.text: An incredible balena community member has created open-balena-admin, a platform to deploy and manage IoT devices using openbalena

projects.title: Build a LoRaWAN Gateway with LTE-M backhaul
projects.text: Build your LoRaWAN gateway and connect it to LTE-M to offload the data using a SIMCom cellular modem and Monogoto SIM, and manage the whole system using balena.
